parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.label: Subscription Name
parameters.description: Select the Subscription Name that will be used for the queries

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.description: Select the Workspce Name that will be used for the queries.

parameters.name: TimeRange
parameters.label: Time Range
parameters.description: Select the Time Range that will be used for the queries.

parameters.name: SelectLogType
parameters.label: Log Types
parameters.description: Select the Log Type to filter the data
parameters.query:
CiscoMeraki
| distinct LogType
| extend LogType = iff(isempty(LogType),"empty",LogType)
| sort by LogType asc

parameters.name: SelectNetworkDirection
parameters.label: Network Direction
parameters.description: Select the Network Direction to filter the data
parameters.query:
CiscoMeraki
| distinct NetworkDirection
| extend NetworkDirection = iif(isempty(NetworkDirection),"empty",NetworkDirection)
| order by NetworkDirection asc

content.query:
CiscoMeraki
| extend LogType = iif(isempty(LogType),"empty",LogType)
| where LogType in ('' {SelectLogType})
| extend NetworkDirection = iif(isempty(NetworkDirection),"empty",NetworkDirection)
| where NetworkDirection in ('' {SelectNetworkDirection})
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated step 1h by LogType
content.title: Total Events by Log Type

content.query:
CiscoMeraki
| where bin(TimeGenerated,1h) {TimeRangeLogType}
| extend LogType = iff(isempty(LogType),"empty",LogType)
| where LogType in ('' {SelectLogType})
| extend NetworkDirection = iif(isempty(NetworkDirection),"empty",NetworkDirection)
| where NetworkDirection in ('' {SelectNetworkDirection})
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName, LogType, EventType, SrcIpAddr, SrcPortNumber, SrcMacAddr, DstIpAddr, DstPortNumber, DstMacAddr, HttpRequestMethod, Url,  NetworkProtocol, NetworkDirection
| order by TimeGenerated
content.title: Total Events by Log Type - Details

content.query:
CiscoMeraki
| where LogType in ('' {SelectLogType})
| where isnotempty(EventType)
| summarize count() by EventType
| sort by count_
content.title: Total Events by Event Type

content.query:
CiscoMeraki 
| where LogType in ('' {SelectLogType})
| where isnotempty(EventType) and EventType in ('' {EventType:value})
| project DeviceName, LogType, EventType, SrcIpAddr, SrcPortNumber, SrcMacAddr, DstIpAddr, DstPortNumber, DstMacAddr
content.title: Total Events by Event Type - Details
content.noDataMessage: Please select Event Type(s) from the left section to view results.

content.query:
CiscoMeraki
| extend LogType = iif(isempty(LogType),"empty",LogType)
| where LogType in ('' {SelectLogType})
| extend NetworkDirection = iif(isempty(NetworkDirection),"empty",NetworkDirection)
| where NetworkDirection in ('' {SelectNetworkDirection})
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated step 1h by NetworkDirection
content.title: Total Events by Network Direction

content.query:
CiscoMeraki
| where bin(TimeGenerated,1h) {TimeRangeNetworkDirection}
| extend LogType = iif(isempty(LogType),"empty",LogType)
| where LogType in ('' {SelectLogType})
| extend NetworkDirection = iff(isempty(NetworkDirection),"empty",NetworkDirection)
| where NetworkDirection in ('' {SelectNetworkDirection})
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName, LogType, EventType, SrcIpAddr, SrcPortNumber, SrcMacAddr, DstIpAddr, DstPortNumber, DstMacAddr, HttpRequestMethod, Url,NetworkProtocol, NetworkDirection
| order by TimeGenerated
content.title: Total Events by Network Direction - Details

content.query:
CiscoMeraki
| extend NetworkProtocol = iff(isempty(NetworkProtocol),"empty",NetworkProtocol)
| extend LogType = iif(isempty(LogType),"empty",LogType)
| where LogType in ('' {SelectLogType})
| extend NetworkDirection = iif(isempty(NetworkDirection),"empty",NetworkDirection)
| where NetworkDirection in ('' {SelectNetworkDirection})
| summarize count() by NetworkProtocol
content.title: Total Events by Network Protocol

content.query:
CiscoMeraki
| extend NetworkProtocol = iff(isempty(NetworkProtocol),"empty",NetworkProtocol)
| extend LogType = iif(isempty(LogType),"empty",LogType)
| where LogType in ('' {SelectLogType})
| extend NetworkDirection = iif(isempty(NetworkDirection),"empty",NetworkDirection)
| where NetworkDirection in ('' {SelectNetworkDirection})
| summarize count() by Action
content.title: Total Events by State

parameters.name: SelectLogType
parameters.label: Log Types
parameters.description: Select the Log Type to filter the data
parameters.query:
CiscoMeraki
| distinct LogType
| extend LogType = iff(isempty(LogType),"empty",LogType)
| sort by LogType asc

content.json: Found_in_Threat_Intel correlates SrcIPAddr and DestIPAddr with Threat Intelligence data present in Sentinel. This helps identify new threat intelligence information that you can use to further enhance your overall security posture.

content.query:
CiscoMeraki
| where isnotempty(DeviceName)
| extend LogType = iif(isempty(LogType), "empty", LogType)
| where LogType in ('' {SelectLogType})
| summarize count() by DeviceName
| project-rename Network_Device_name = DeviceName, Events_count = count_
| sort by Events_count
content.title: Top Affected Network Devices

content.query:
let maliciousIP = ThreatIntelIndicatorsv2 | distinct NetworkIP | where isnotempty(NetworkIP);
CiscoMeraki
| where isnotempty(DeviceName)
| extend LogType = iif(isempty(LogType), "empty", LogType)
| where DeviceName in ('' {Network_Device_name}) and LogType in ('' {SelectLogType})
| project DeviceName, LogType, SrcIpAddr, SrcPortNumber, SrcMacAddr, DstIpAddr, DstPortNumber, DstMacAddr, Action
| extend Found_in_Threat_Intel = iif(SrcIpAddr in (maliciousIP) or DstIpAddr in (maliciousIP), "Yes", "No")
| project-reorder Found_in_Threat_Intel
| order by Found_in_Threat_Intel, LogType
content.title: Events from Affected Network Device(s)
content.noDataMessage: Please select Affected Network Device(s) from the left section to view results.

parameters.name: SelectLogType
parameters.label: Log Types
parameters.description: Select the Log Type to filter the data
parameters.query:
CiscoMeraki
| distinct LogType
| extend LogType = iff(isempty(LogType),"empty",LogType)
| sort by LogType asc

CiscoMeraki
| where LogType in ('' {SelectLogType})
| where isnotempty(SrcIpAddr)
| summarize count() by SrcIpAddr
| sort by count_

CiscoMeraki

| project DeviceName, LogType, SrcIpAddr, SrcPortNumber, SrcMacAddr, DstIpAddr, DstPortNumber, DstMacAddr

content.noDataMessage: Please select Affected IP(s) from the left section to view results.

content.noDataMessage: Please select Affected Outbound Destination(s) from the left section to view results.

CiscoMeraki
| where LogType in ('' {SelectLogType})

CiscoMeraki
| where LogType in ('' {SelectLogType})
| where SrcPortNumber in ("0" {SrcPortNumber})
| project DeviceName, LogType, SrcIpAddr, SrcPortNumber, SrcMacAddr, DstIpAddr, DstPortNumber, DstMacAddr
content.title: Events from Affected Source Port(s)
content.noDataMessage: Please select Affected Port(s) from the left section to view results.

content.query:
CiscoMeraki
| where LogType in ('' {SelectLogType})
| where DstPortNumber in ("0" {DstPortNumber})
| project DeviceName, LogType, SrcIpAddr, SrcPortNumber, SrcMacAddr, DstIpAddr, DstPortNumber, DstMacAddr
content.title: Events from Affected Destination Port(s)
content.noDataMessage: Please select Affected Port(s) from the left section to view results.

content.json: Found_in_Threat_Intel correlates Sha256 with Threat Intelligence data present in Sentinel. This helps identify new threat intelligence information that you can use to further enhance your overall security posture.

content.query:
let maliciousFileHash = ThreatIntelIndicatorsv2 | where isnotempty(FileHashValue) | distinct FileHashValue;
CiscoMeraki
| where Disposition == "malicious"
| summarize Instances=count() by DeviceName, Sha256, Url, Action
| extend Found_in_Threat_Intel = iif(isnotempty(Sha256) and Sha256 in (maliciousFileHash), "Yes", "No")
| project-reorder Found_in_Threat_Intel, DeviceName, Sha256, Url, Action, Instances
| order by Found_in_Threat_Intel, Instances
content.title: Top Malware Detections

content.query:
let maliciousFileHash = ThreatIntelIndicatorsv2 | where isnotempty(FileHashValue) | distinct FileHashValue;
CiscoMeraki
| where Disposition == "malicious" and Action == "deny"
| summarize Instances=count() by DeviceName, Sha256, Url, Action
| extend Found_in_Threat_Intel = iif(isnotempty(Sha256) and Sha256 in (maliciousFileHash), "Yes", "No")
| project-reorder Found_in_Threat_Intel, DeviceName, Sha256, Url, Action, Instances
| order by Found_in_Threat_Intel, Instances
content.title: Top Retrospective Malware Detections

parameters.query:
CiscoMeraki
| distinct LogType
| extend LogType = iif(isempty(LogType), "empty", LogType)
| order by LogType asc

content.query:
CiscoMeraki 
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    DeviceName=coalesce(DeviceName,"empty"),
    LogType=coalesce(LogType,"empty"),
    SrcIpAddr=coalesce(SrcIpAddr,"-"),
    SrcPortNumber=coalesce(SrcPortNumber,0),
    SrcMacAddr=coalesce(SrcMacAddr,"-"),
    DstIpAddr=coalesce(DstIpAddr,"-"),
    DstPortNumber=coalesce(DstPortNumber,0),
    DstMacAddr=coalesce(DstMacAddr,"-"),
    HttpRequestMethod=coalesce(HttpRequestMethod,"empty"),
    Url=coalesce(Url,"empty"),
    NetworkProtocol=coalesce(NetworkProtocol,"empty"),
    NetworkDirection=coalesce(NetworkDirection,"empty")
| where DeviceName in ('' {DeviceName:value}) and LogType in ('' {LogType:value}) and SrcIpAddr in ('' {SrcIpAddr:value}) and SrcMacAddr in ('' {SrcMacAddr:value}) and DstIpAddr in ('' {DstIpAddr:value}) and DstMacAddr in ('' {DstMacAddr:value}) and HttpRequestMethod in ('' {HttpRequestMethod:value}) and Url in ('' {Url:value}) and NetworkProtocol in ('' {NetworkProtocol:value}) and NetworkDirection in ('' {NetworkDirection:value})
| where SrcPortNumber in ('' {SrcPortNumber:value}) and DstPortNumber in ('' {DstPortNumber:value})
| order by TimeGenerated
content.title: All Events
